sections.summary:
To obtain a challenging position where experience as an Executive Chef and a food handlers license will be utilized. And experience working for
multiple James Beard Award winners Alfred Portale and Paul Bartolotta. Core Qualifications Executive Chef Menu Developing Chef de Cuisine
Schedule,Food &Labor Executive Sous Chef Inventory &Ordering Sous Chef Microsoft Excel &Word
